alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 9:15PM EDT until August 11 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Michigan, including the following counties, Genesee, Livingston and Shiawassee. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM EDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fenton, Durand, Fowlerville, Perry, Laingsburg, Linden, Cohoctah, Morrice, Byron, Bancroft, Gaines, Oak Grove, Lake Fenton, Argentine, Conway Township, Deerfield Township, Tyrone Township and Shaftsburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
